questions.question: 1. In the event of a fire in your work area, your best course of action is to:
choices: a) Attempt to fight the fire and rescue others
b) Leave the work area, using a designated escape route
c) Shelter in a room without windows
d) d Shelter in a room without windows
questions.rational: Leave the work area, using a designated escape route as you should first move towards to a safe area in the case of a fire.

questions.question: 2. True or False question?
questions.rational: A source of ignition, oxygen and fuel is needed to start a fire.

questions.question: 3. To encourage compassion among colleagues one should:
choices: b) Only consider one’s own perspective
c) Ignore students and bank staff
d) Tell others what to do

questions.question: 4. What are the three basic ingredients needed to start a fire?
choices: a) A source of ignition, oxygen and fuel
questions.rational: A source of ignition, oxygen and fuel is needed to start a fire.
